ygData.subject: RE: Tib and Rathe Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: No, I didn t mean they were in Rathe Mountains. Actually the guards I was killing were in North Karana. Thats where the Griffs and HGs would bunch up on me. I
ygData.messageBody:
No, I didn't mean they were in Rathe Mountains. Actually the guards I was
killing were in North Karana. Thats where the Griffs and HGs would bunch up
on me. I did go to Tib last night, and the unkempt preservers weren't the
problem I thought they would be - it was the damn bears! There were so many
bears out there that I could hardly meditate! Would always have to zap them
so they didn't take my pet into the druid camp....

-- Darnizhaan

-----Original Message-----
From: Naeeldar [mailto:jackal@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 7:33 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Tib and Rathe Mountains


From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>

Hmm griffons in Rathe Mountinas? Where's the loc for these towers I'll have
to check it out griffons are great exp for me to kite at level 34.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 34th Circle
-----Original Message-----
From: Saiveau, Jim <Jim.Saiveau@...>
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com' <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, August 05, 1999 7:47 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Tib and Rathe Mountains


>From: "Saiveau, Jim" <Jim.Saiveau@...>
>
>I've spent the last 2 levels killing Guards at the guard towers. Problem is
>they are covered by HGs and griffons at all times. Also the ones I've found
>are around level 22 - not much XP. One positive thing about them - they
>spawn fast! I'm sure there are guards around my level, I just haven't found
>them yet....
>
>Damn those Qeynos kite shields are heavy....
>-- Darnizhaan
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mark Muller [mailto:markm@...]
>Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 4:42 PM
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Tib and Rathe Mountains
>
>
>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>No clue about the Rathe mountains, but as for things to kill at level 26,
be
>creative! or more importantly...be EVIL :) people kill darkelf guards all
>the time...why not spread some of that love back to the good races, don't
>stop with guards either, there are plenty of goodly npc's just waiting to
be
>slaughtered for xp and loot. :)
>
>-Grizumpy
>
>
>> Does anyone have the loc for Tib? I'm level 26, and heard this wasn't the
>> best place to solo (unkempt druids), but the two treants and the aviak
>city
>> are sooooo over camped on my server. Even at 4 in the morning when only
>550
>> are on the server, at least 65 are in S. Karana. If anyone has better
>ideas
>> of what to solo at this level, I'd be very interested in hearing from
you.
>I
>> really don't like the idea of wandering mobs sneaking up on me - but its
>> better than waiting 2 hours for a damn aviak....
>
>
>
